**Categorizing IT ticket**

It frequently mentions "network drive" and "reconnect," which aligns with categories like "Storage" or "Access." While there might be aspects of "Internal Project," it seems most appropriate to lean towards "Storage" or "Access" due to the focus on drive connections.**Categorizing IT ticket**
